title: When Destiny Calls
description: From award-winning author Suzanne Elizabeth "Humor, action, romance. A delightful, original read."  -RT Magazine"WILL YOU TRAVEL BACK IN TIME TO SAVE YOUR SOULMATE?"When 21st century police officer Kristen Ford opens her door late one night to a mysterious stranger with an unbelievable request, she suddenly finds herself hurled back in time to the Wild West, facing off against a band of outlaws led by a handsome but deadly gunslinger.A wanted man in three states, Parrish wouldn't trust a woman with his hat, let alone his heart. But there's something intriguing about pretty little Miss Ford that he can't seem to resist. If only she wasn't crazy as a loon.Kristen's only hope of ever returning home to the 21st century is to find a way to rehabilitate her lawless soulmate. But will her growing feelings for Parrish prevent her from answering destiny's call?
author: Suzanne Elizabeth
